Class HMM

  • java.lang.Object
    • HMM

  • public class HMM
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a HMM. Much of the terminology is borrowed from a very pedagogic paper by Rabiner and Juang: http://www.cs.ubc.ca/~murphyk/Bayes/rabiner.pdf We recommend that you read the article as an introduction to HMMs.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HMM(double[][] A, double[][] B, double[] pi) 
      HMM(int numberOfStates, int numberOfEmissions)

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Copies a HMM onto this one.
      void estimateModel(int[] O)
      Re-estimates this HMM from a sequence of observed emissions.
      double[] estimateProbabilityDistributionOfNextEmission(double[] currentStateProbabilityDistribution)
      Estimates the probability distribution of the next emission, given the current state probability distribution.
      double estimateProbabilityOfEmissionSequence(int[] O)
      Estimates the probability of a sequence of observed emissions, assuming this HMM.
      int[] estimateStateSequence(int[] O)
      Estimates the hidden states from which a sequence of emissions were observed.

    • Method Detail

      • estimateProbabilityDistributionOfNextEmission

        public double[] estimateProbabilityDistributionOfNextEmission(double[] currentStateProbabilityDistribution)
        Estimates the probability distribution of the next emission, given the current state probability distribution. Note that this method solves the preparatory exercise HMM1.
        Parameters:
        currentStateProbabilityDistribution - the current state probability distribution

      • estimateProbabilityOfEmissionSequence

        public double estimateProbabilityOfEmissionSequence(int[] O)
        Estimates the probability of a sequence of observed emissions, assuming this HMM. Note that this method solves the preparatory exercise HMM2.
        Parameters:
        O - the sequence of observed emissions

      • estimateStateSequence

        public int[] estimateStateSequence(int[] O)
        Estimates the hidden states from which a sequence of emissions were observed. Note that this method solves the preparatory exercise HMM3.
        Parameters:
        O - the sequence of observed emissions

      • estimateModel

        public void estimateModel(int[] O)
        Re-estimates this HMM from a sequence of observed emissions. Note that this method uses A, B and pi. Successful results are NOT guaranteed if these have improper values considering the sequence of observations O! Note that this method solves the preparatory exercise HMM4.
        Parameters:
        O - the sequence of observed emissions

      • copyHMM

        public void copyHMM(HMM hmm)
        Copies a HMM onto this one.
        Parameters:
        hmm - the HMM you are going to copy to this one.
